verses.roman:
sannyāsa kari' prabhu yabe śāntipura āilā
tabe āsi' raghunātha prabhure mililā

synonyms: sannyāsa kari'-after accepting the sannyāsa order; prabhu—the Lord; yabe—when; śāntipura āilā—went to Śāntipura; tabe—at that time; āsi'-coming; raghunātha—Raghunātha dāsa; prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mililā—met.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu returned to Śāntipura after accepting the renounced order, Raghunātha dāsa met Him.
